bibl.title: Further Letters from the Archive of Apa Ioannes. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Five papyrus letters presumably acquired by B.P. Grenfell and A.S. Hunt in early December 1898 as part of the "Hermopolis" collection (H.I. Bell called the collection "P. Misc."). Three letters certainly and two probably belong to the archive of Apa Ioannes (Upper Egypt, late IVth cent.).
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. I 134a + II 98a; II 11a; II 20a; II 70; II 179a
GONIS Nikolaos, Further Letters from the Archive of Apa Ioannes. Avec résumé en anglais.

Five papyrus letters presumably acquired by B.P. Grenfell and A.S. Hunt in early December 1898 as part of the "Hermopolis" collection (H.I. Bell called the collection "P. Misc."). Three letters certainly and two probably belong to the archive of Apa Ioannes (Upper Egypt, late IVth cent.).
